mapper.sql: SELECT ORG_CD as orgCd , IMG_SN as imgSn , IMG_TYPE_CD as imgTypeCd , BKGR_FILE_SN as bkgrFileSn , BKGR_IMG_NM as bkgrImgNm , BKGR_FILE_URL as bkgrFileUrl , DESC_FILE_SN as descFileSn , DESC_IMG_NM as descImgNm , DESC_FILE_URL as descFileUrl , CONN_FILE_SN as connFileSn , CONN_URL as connUrl , CONN_TRGT as connTrgt , IMG_ODR as imgOdr , REG_NO as regNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.REG_NO) ) AS regNm , REG_DTTM as regDttm , MOD_NO as modNo , ( SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(A.MOD_NO) ) AS modNm , MOD_DTTM as modDttm , IMG_TITLE as imgTitle FROM tb_org_img_info A WHERE ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
mapper.select:
/* SQL ID : list 설 명 : 기관 이미지의 전체 목록 */
ORDER BY IMG_ODR

/* SQL ID : listPageing 설 명 : 기관 이미지의 페이징 목록 */
ORDER BY IMGODR
/* SQL ID : selectKey 설 명 : 기관 이미지의 키를 생성 */ SELECT nextval('SQ_ORG_IMG_INFO')
